pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Beach is variant of the Beach biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place, as the Beach biome is composed of mostly by Sand and Water, but but is covered on top with a layer of Snow and water were turned into Ice.
$(li)Seals can be found lying on the Ice of these Beaches.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Snowy Beach$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
